channel.title: Talking Kotlin
channel.description: A bimonthly podcast that covers the Kotlin programming language by JetBrains, as well as related technologies. Hosted by Hadi Hariri
channel.itunes:subtitle: A bimonthly podcast that covers the Kotlin progra…
channel.itunes:author: A Podcast on Kotlin and more

item.title: Turbocharging Kotlin: Arrow Analysis, Optics & Meta
item.itunes:author: A Podcast on Kotlin and more
item.itunes:summary: We chat with Raul, Simon, and Alejandro to learn how Arrow adds functional paradigms and safety to Kotlin, and how it aims to influence the future of the language.
item.itunes:subtitle: We chat with Raul, Simon, and Alejandro to learn …
item.description: We chat with Raul, Simon, and Alejandro to learn how Arrow adds functional paradigms and safety to Kotlin, and how it aims to influence the future of the language.

item.title: 70 Billion Events per Day – Adobe & Kotlin
item.itunes:author: A Podcast on Kotlin and more
item.itunes:summary: We talked to Rares Vlasceanu and Catalin Costache from Adobe about how they handle 70 000 000 000 events per day with the help of Kotlin and Ktor.
item.itunes:subtitle: We talked to Rares Vlasceanu and Catalin Costache…
item.description: We talked to Rares Vlasceanu and Catalin Costache from Adobe about how they handle 70 000 000 000 events per day with the help of Kotlin and Ktor.
